diff_hunk:
@@ -1,3 +1,22 @@
+r"""
+The following constraints are implemented:
+
+- ``constraints.boolean``
+- ``constraints.dependent``
+- ``constraints.greater_than(lower_bound)``
+- ``constraints.integer_interval(lower_bound, upper_bound)``
+- ``constraints.interval(lower_bound, upper_bound)``
+- ``constraints.lower_cholesky``
+- ``constraints.lower_triangular``
+- ``constraints.lower_triangular``
+- ``constraints.nonnegative_integer``
+- ``constraints.positive``
+- ``constraints.positive_integer``
+- ``constraints.real``
+- ``constraints.simplex``
+- ``constraints.unit_interval``
+"""
body: Right. I still think `form torch.distributions.constraint_registry import biject_to` is kind of ugly (registry is an implementation detail). How about importing those two functions at the bottom of `transforms.py`?
